price: Au wao wana ufalme wa mbingu na ardhi na viliomo kati yao? Basi nawazipande njia za kwendea huko!
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُم مُّلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبِ
footnotes: Tena tunawauliza: Kwani wao wanao ufalme wa mbingu na ardhi na viliomo baina yao? Ikiwa hivyo basi nawazipande ngazi mpaka wafikie pahala ambapo watakuwa wakitoa hukumu kama watakavyo, kama wanaweza!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am lahum mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā falyartaqū fī al-asbābi
